issue.title: drcsim package uninstalls with new Gazebo in Ubuntu

content.raw:
@gerkey's response to mailing list pasted below:

We just released Gazebo 1.9.0, which is incompatible with DRCSim
2.6.x.  DRCSim 2.7.0 is coming soon.

In the meantime, you can manually install the latest Gazebo 1.8.x
release.  E.g., if you're on 64-bit Ubuntu Precise:

sudo apt-get remove gazebo
wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/gazebo_1.8.7-1~precise_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i gazebo_1.8.7-1~precise_amd64.deb
sudo apt-get install drcsim

In general, you can find all the previous binary releases at
http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/.
content.html:
@gerkey's response to mailing list pasted below:

We just released Gazebo 1.9.0, which is incompatible with DRCSim 2.6.x. DRCSim 2.7.0 is coming soon.

In the meantime, you can manually install the latest Gazebo 1.8.x release. E.g., if you're on 64-bit Ubuntu Precise:

sudo apt-get remove gazebo wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/gazebo_1.8.7-1~precise_amd64.deb sudo dpkg -i gazebo_1.8.7-1~precise_amd64.deb sudo apt-get install drcsim

In general, you can find all the previous binary releases at http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/.

issue.title: drcsim package uninstalls with new Gazebo in Ubuntu

content.raw: drcsim 2.7 debs are out. They are compatible with gazebo 1.9 debs
content.html: drcsim 2.7 debs are out. They are compatible with gazebo 1.9 debs
